welcome_message_body: Welcome to Lhokseumawe, Indonesia! This charming city is known for its beautiful beaches, rich culture, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Lhokseumawe has to offer during your stay.

restaurants.name: Ayam Penyet Pak Ulis
restaurants.description: Ayam Penyet Pak Ulis is a fried chicken joint located in Lhokseumawe.
restaurants.address: Jl.Merdeka (Depan Pendopo Bupati Aceh Utara), Lhokseumawe, Aceh 24351

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lhoksumawe Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
